sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography';
import Button from '@mui/material/Button';
import Box from '@mui/material/Box';
import { Container, Paper } from '@mui/material';

function HomePage({ onStart }) {
  return (
    <Container maxWidth="sm" sx={{ mt: 5 }}>
      <Paper
        elevation={3}
        sx={{
          padding: 4,
          borderRadius: 2,
          textAlign: 'center',
        }}
      >
        <Box sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
          <Typography variant="h2" gutterBottom>
            Welcome to Take It Easy!
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
            Take It Easy is a simple yet addictive puzzle game. Arrange tiles on
            the board to score as many points as possible. Follow the
            instructions below to get started.
          </Typography>
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'left' }}>
          <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
            Instructions:
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" paragraph>
            1. Select an AI player to compete against.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" paragraph>
            2. Tiles will be generated randomly.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" paragraph>
            3. Place the tiles on the board to form continuous lines of the same
            color.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" paragraph>
            4. The game ends when all tiles are placed.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" paragraph>
            5. The player with the highest score wins!
          </Typography>
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
          <Button
            variant="contained"
            color="primary"
            size="large"
            onClick={onStart}
          >
            Let's play
          </Button>
        </Box>
      </Paper>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default HomePage;
